DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness safety ketamine etomidate rapid sequence intubation ( RSI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Ketamine Versus Etomidate Rapid Sequence Intubation
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial etomidate versus ketamine rapid sequence intubation ( RSI ) . RSI refers process patient require emergency airway management undergo sedation paralysis prior insertion endotracheal tube ( airway tube ) . Patients require intubation randomize intubation perform either ketamine etomidate . All care discretion treat physician . The purpose study compare efficacy safety ketamine etomidate rapid sequence intubation .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age Undergoing rapid sequence intubation ( RSI ) Emergency Department Known contraindication ketamine etomidate Patient condition increase heart rate blood pressure would hazardous , judge treat physician Patient know suspect increased intracranial pressure , base history physical examination perform treat physician . Females childbearing age , defined 1850 year , document pregnancy test institution confirm pregnant confirm surgical procedure prevent pregnancy , i.e. , tubal ligation , hysterectomy . The timing pregnancy test investigative team consider subject nonpregnant document negative test current hospitalization upon direct transfer outside institution current illness .
